S

scan(int, int) - Static method in class gamer.Proto
Scan some "square" in the scenario, base on Proto's current position(works like a raycast).Example: if the robot's position is (2,4) and you scan(1,0), this actually will scan the square at (3,4).
scan(int, int, boolean) - Static method in class gamer.Proto
Scan some "square" in the scenario, base on Proto's current position(works like a raycast).Example: if the robot's position is (2,4) and you scan(1,0), this actually will scan the square at (3,4).
setDirectionToLeft() - Static method in class gamer.Proto
Set the robot direction to left.
setDirectionToRight() - Static method in class gamer.Proto
Set the robot direction to right.
Sphere1 - Class in gamer
This class represents the sphere 1, and contains its x and y coordinates.
